attributes.action: Make people more aware of mental health and suicide prevention schemes in school
attributes.background: One in Four (26%) young people in the UK experience suicidal thoughts and since 2007 suicide rates have increased for students, let's make it compulsory to make people aware of mental health and suicide prevention in Secondary schools Years 10 + help save young lives from the pain and loneliness!

rejection.details:
This petition is similar to yours:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/179727
